short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically tests coupon codes during checkout

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Semi automated online coupon finder
- Right click and selected the coupon field and submit button 
- Tests the 100 most common coupon codes
- Much faster than going to coupon finder websites and manually copy/pasting codes
- Secure and all code is client side, you can even modify it if you want!
